segments.text: You'll never guess what I won at work today ! - Tickets to tonight's final NBA game .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two , I hope and I hope that by telling me about them you are planning on taking me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course ! And here's the best part , they are court side seats !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How in the world ! Who came up with seats like that from your company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some guy in the accounting department has a brother on the team !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can't beat that ! Thank you accounting guy !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The game starts at seven so we'd better hustle , it's already five .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are we waiting for ? Let's go !
segments.speaker: S2
